Design is not a decoration,

In startups, I moved fast, felt deeper, and built for belonging — where commerce felt like connection. In service, I danced between industries, solving for twenty stories with one steady mindset — empathy.

Rohan Janardhan Rao

Design is not a decoration,

it's direction

In startups, I moved fast, felt deeper, and built for belonging — where commerce felt like connection. In service, I danced between industries, solving for twenty stories with one steady mindset — empathy.

Lakshya

Advanced monitoring dashboard powered by artificial intelligence, featuring predictive insights, performance metrics, cost optimization tracking, and real-time system health indicators

Lasting Asset

Secure contact management system with advanced encryption, intuitive user interface, and comprehensive data protection features for professional networking.

Mutual Fund Cart Page

Streamlined cart interface for mutual fund investments with intuitive selection, comparison tools, and seamless checkout experience for financial planning.

Financial Concierge

AI-powered financial assistant providing personalized banking recommendations, investment insights, and comprehensive financial planning for BFSI sector.

Masha AI

Intelligent workspace platform leveraging AI to enhance productivity, collaboration, and workflow optimization for modern teams and enterprises.

BFSI Agent App

Comprehensive mobile application for banking and financial services agents, featuring client management, transaction processing, and performance analytics.

SBCC Landing page

Modern landing page with advanced parallax effects, smooth animations, and engaging visual storytelling for enhanced user experience.

404 Page - Mutual Fund

Creative error page design for mutual fund platform, transforming user frustration into engagement with helpful navigation and visual appeal.

Developer portal Hero section & Product Feature

Compelling hero section and feature showcase for developer portal, emphasizing API capabilities, documentation quality, and developer experience.

Hackathon Challenges

Dynamic competition platform design featuring challenge listings, team formation tools, and interactive elements to engage developers and innovators.

Stay Home Landing Page

Responsive landing page promoting remote work culture with compelling visuals, clear messaging, and optimized user journey for maximum conversion.

Environment Monitoring Dashboard

Comprehensive environmental data visualization platform with real-time monitoring, predictive analytics, and actionable insights for sustainability management.

Architecture PPT Slide

Professional presentation slide design showcasing system architecture with clear visual hierarchy, technical diagrams, and engaging layout for stakeholder communication.
